items.title: Decision: UK-Faroe Islands committee documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from the Faroe Islands-UK committees.

items.title: Stacked gas consumption statistics data
items.summary: Gas consumption data for 2005 to 2024 as a single table, with years stacked one above the other.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Lower and Middle Super Output Areas gas consumption
items.summary: Lower Super Output Area (LSOA), Middle Super Output Area (MSOA) and Intermediate Geography Zone (IGZ) gas data.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Regional and local authority gas consumption statistics
items.summary: Estimates of gas consumption at region and local authority levels in Great Britain.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Subnational electricity and gas consumption summary report 2024
items.summary: Provides estimates of annual electricity and gas consumption below national level.

items.title: Research: Government response to resale of live events tickets consultation: analytical note
items.summary: ​​Analytical note setting out the Department for Business and Trade’s (DBT) methodology for estimating the impact of new rules to ban ticket touting.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Research: Hydrogen production business model
items.summary: Updates on the hydrogen production business model, including the Low Carbon Hydrogen Agreement.

items.title: Research: Energy Innovation Needs Assessments 2025
items.summary: The Energy Innovation Needs Assessments (EINAs) are an independent assessment of the role of innovation in key technologies in the UK’s future energy system.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment core statistics book
items.summary: A monthly snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment position, summarising trade statistics produced by ONS, HMRC, DBT and others.

items.title: Official Statistics: UK trade in numbers
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s latest trade and investment position, summarising statistics produced by ONS, DBT, and UNCTAD.

items.title: Notice: UK ETS Allocation Table for operators of installations
items.summary: This table contains a list of each installation’s free allocation for the 2021 to 2026 allocation period.

items.title: Businesses, unions and civil society leaders welcome Royal Assent of Employment Rights Act
items.summary: Leaders from across the business community, trade union movement and wider civil society have welcomed the Employment Rights Act receiving Royal Assent.

items.title: Promotional material: Employment Rights Bill: factsheets
items.summary: Further details on the measures included within the Employment Rights Bill.

items.title: Statutory guidance: Reasonable steps to be taken by a trade union: code of practice
items.summary: Guidance for trade unions on “reasonable steps” in relation to minimum service levels.

items.title: Correspondence: Long duration electricity storage: open letter to industry
items.summary: Open letter from the Minister for Energy, Michael Shanks, explaining how the government is supporting long duration electricity storage.

items.title: Policy paper: National Policy Statement for nuclear energy generation (EN-7)
items.summary: Government policy on the need for and standards applicable to nuclear energy generation projects seeking development consent.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on aluminium foil from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on aluminium foil from China.

items.title: Guidance: UK-Republic of Korea upgraded Free Trade Agreement: technical note
items.summary: This technical note sets out the Department for Business and Trade’s (DBT) headline results of the economic impact of the upgraded UK-Republic of Korea (RoK) Free Trade Agreement (FTA).

items.title: Policy paper: Interministerial Group for Trade communiqué: 2 June 2025
items.summary: A note of the meeting held by the Interministerial Group for Trade.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2025/34: update to general trade licence Russia sanctions – fertilisers
items.summary: The Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) has updated the general trade licence Russia sanctions – financial services and funds related to fertilisers.

items.title: Guidance: Justification of Practices Involving Ionising Radiation application register
items.summary: Applications and decisions made under Regulations 9, 10 and 12 of the Justification of Practices involving Ionising Radiation Regulations (JoPIIRR) 2004.

items.title: Transparency data: AI Energy Council meetings minutes
items.summary: Minutes of the meetings for the AI Energy Council.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.title: Guidance: Subnational methodology and guidance
items.summary: Information on subnational energy consumption statistics.

items.title: Quarterly domestic energy switching statistics
items.summary: Quarterly and annual estimates of the total number of switches by electricity and gas customers.

items.title: Prices of fuels purchased by manufacturing industry
items.summary: Quarterly and annual prices of fuels purchased by manufacturing industry, in original units and p/kWh, split into consumption sizebands.

items.title: Prices of fuels purchased by major power producers
items.summary: Quarterly and annual prices of fuels purchased by power generators.

items.title: Industrial energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and annual price indices for industrial fuels, in real and current terms, including and excluding the Climate Change Levy (CCL).

items.title: Gas and electricity prices in the non-domestic sector
items.summary: Quarterly and annual gas and electricity prices for the non-domestic sector, including and excluding the Climate Change Levy (CCL), split into consumption size bands.

items.title: Guidance: General trade licence Russia sanctions – fertilisers
items.summary: Licence relating to the provision of certain financial services to a person connected with Russia for the supply or delivery of fertiliser goods.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel and panel chair privacy notice
items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.title: Guidance: Recognition of UK professional qualifications in EU member states
items.summary: Information to help you identify recognition routes available for UK professional qualifications in European Union (EU) member states.

items.title: New laws bring the world of work into the 21st century
items.summary: Over 15 million people across the UK are expected to benefit as the Employment Rights Act receives Royal Assent.

items.title: Operating an orbital space object: rules and regulations
items.summary: Regulations you must comply with when operating an orbital space object. For example, a satellite.

items.title: Unlocking business: reform driven by you
items.summary: This questionnaire asks businesses large and small to tell government about regulation which is not fit for purpose and unjustifiably inhibits growth, innovation and investment.

items.summary: This page sets out the government’s progress on the Grenfell Tower Inquiry’s Phase 2 recommendations and updates on Phase 1 recommendations.

items.title: Operating a spaceport: rules and regulations
items.summary: Regulations you must comply with when operating a spaceport.

items.title: Launching or returning a rocket or space plane: rules and regulations
items.summary: Regulations you must comply with when launching or returning a rocket or space plane.
